game.helpmessage:
Available Commands:
go <exit> - Go through exit
help - Show this help message
quit - Leave the game
game.commandinvalidmessage: I don't understand what you mean.
game.welcomemessage:
Welcome to SportyZombies!
Good luck and have fun!
game.leavemessage:
Thank you very much for playing!
Goodbye!

soccerfieldn.description: You are at the northern half of the soccer field.

soccerfields.description: You are at the southern half of the soccer field.

trackn.description: You are at the northern part of the running track.

tracknw.description: You are at the northwestern part of the running track.

trackne.description: You are at the northeastern part of the running track.

tracks.description: You are at the southern part of the running track.

tracksw.description: You are at the southwestern part of the running track.

trackse.description: You are at the southeastern part of the running track.
